1.「ありがとうございます <cs_pchero>さま。| おかげで 無事に たどり: Thank you <cs_pchero>. Thanks to you, I got|there safely.

2.「この地が 巨竜の霊丘と呼ばれているのは| 見てのとおり 巨大な竜の骨が| 静か: This place is called Dragon Hill because, as|you can see, the bones of a gigantic dragon|rest quietly here.

3.「かつて 天空を治めたという白銀の竜が| このアストルティアに墜ち 屍となった姿: The legend tells of a silver dragon that once|ruled the skies, but crashed in Astoltia and|became a corpse.

4.「この地を 儀式の舞台と選んだのは| その竜の聖なるチカラを 借りるため。| 儀:
The reason we chose this place as the setting|for our ritual is to borrow the sacred power|of the dragon. This power is necessary for the|
|success of the ritual.

5.「それでは ロディアさまの魂を呼び寄せる| 目覚めの儀式を とりおこないましょう: Let us now perform the awakening ritual that|will call forth the spirit of Rhodia.

6.「何が起こるか わかりません。| <cs_pchero>さまは 儀式の間| 私た: We don't know what will happen. The|<cs_pchero> ask that you protect us during|the Ritual Hall.

7.世告げの姫たちは 太古の祭壇の上で|手を取り合い 儀式を始めた……。: The Oracle Princesses joined hands on the|Ancient Altar and began their ritual...

8.「我ら 世告げの姫の主導者たる| 導きのロディアよ。| 目覚めの時は すでに来た: O Rhodia, our guiding light, leader of the|Oracle Princess. The time of the awakening has|already come...

9.「願わくば その魂よ。| はるかな大地で待つ身に 降臨せよ……。: O, I pray, O soul. Descend to the body that|waits in the far-off land...

10.「導きのロディアよ 目覚めたまえ。| 世告げの時は すでに来たれり……。: Awake, Rhodia, our guide. The time of the|prophecy has already come...

11.世告げの姫たちの身体に|白い光が集まっていく……。: White light gathers on the bodies of the|Oracle Princesses...

12.しかし 突然 その光が はじけ飛んだ！: But suddenly, that light burst into flames!

14.「<cs_pchero>さま。儀式は失敗しました。| ロディアさまの魂は今 呼び: <cs_pchero>. The ritual has failed. It seems|that Rhodia's soul is now in a state that|cannot be summoned.

15.「こうなれば シュゼたちが作った結界の中まで| 直接 迎えにいくしかありません。:
If this happens, we have no choice but to go|directly to the wards created by Shuzet and|the others to pick them up. Please accompany|
| as well.

17.「世告げの姫を マッサツせよ。| すべて マッサツせよ……。: Massacre the Oracle Princess. Massacre them|all...

18.「……結界の中に 魔物が！？| ロディアさまの魂は……？: There's a monster in the wards! Rhodia's|soul...?

20.「……なんとしても 魔物を倒し| ロディアさまの魂を 救わなくてはなりません！|: ...we must do whatever it takes to defeat the|monster and save Rhodia's soul! Let's go|<cs_pchero>!

24.「邪悪なる者の魔の手から 救いだしてくださり| 感謝いたします <cs_pche: Thank you for rescuing us from the clutches of|the evil one <cs_pchero>.

26.「……くわしくは わかりませんが| 私たち 世告げの姫の行動を邪魔するために|: I don't know the details, but I think it is|safe to assume that she was sent to interfere|with the actions of us, the Oracle Princesses.

27.「シュゼとテルナも あの魔物に襲われ| 命を落としたようです……。| ですが 悲: It seems that Shuzet and Terna were attacked|by that monster and lost their lives... but we|don't have time to grieve.

28.「私たちには 滅びの時を迎えるまでに| やらなければならないことが| まだ 残さ: We still have a lot of work to do before we|meet our demise.

29.「……<cs_pchero>さま。これからも| あなたのチカラが 必要となるでし: ...<cs_pchero>. We will need your help in|the future. Please come to Zama Beacon...

31.「<cs_pchero>さま。| ロディアさまを 救っていただき| 本当に あり: <cs_pchero>. Thank you so much for saving|Rhodia.

32.「こちらは 私たちからの お礼です。| どうか お受け取りください。: This is our way of saying thank you. Please|accept it.

33.「それぞれの役目を果たすため 私たちは| 自分たちの あるべき場所に戻ります。|: We will return to where we belong, to do our|part. So...
